column1: Goal: To develop an anthropogenic surface disturbance database for the KDTT planning region

column2: Task
Define planning region boundary
Acquire existing disturbance and non-disturbance datasets (YT)
Acquire existing disturbance and non-disturbance datasets (BC)
Process data by FDA i.e., clip, project, and align
Map extent of disturbance mapping and identify gaps & overlap
Secure access to repository and upload data e.g., Zenodo
Code and document all steps (GitHub repository)
Review existing approaches (documents, meetings)
Write procedures manual for mapping disturbances
Create digitizing template shapefiles + ancillary data
Create quality control workflow (visual + attribute queries)
Test approach on FDA 10AB using SPOT / Planet
Develop temporal component workflow
Identify temporal LANDSAT imagery in QGIS
Add temporal assignments for features in FDA 10ab
Combine digitized maps with YG disturbance maps and compare products
Revise procedures manual and identify priority FDAs
Evaluate cost of mapping per km2 (weighted by disturbances)
Write job description for GIS technician
Hire GIS technicians (university students)
Train technicians using subset of test FDA
Allocate FDA(s) and supervise mapping by technicians
Evaluate quality of maps and revise if necessary
Design validation plan (remote and/or field based)
LFN / Guardians / Youth training (field, drones, etc.)
Identify and acquire validation datasets
Validate random sample of locations (remotely or in field)
Perform accuracy assessment
Code and document validation steps and results
Review of relevant methods (literature, meetings)
Identify and rank opportunities (disturbance type x sensor x tool)
Develop workflow for automated disturbance mapping
Implement methods on test FDA(s)
Evaluate workflow and make recommendations
Review methods used to create HFP and IFL datasets
Develop and code flexible workflow
Develop shiny app to allow users to create their own products
Document all procedures in workbook
Review methods used to create HFP and IFL datasets
Develop and code flexible workflow
Develop shiny app to allow users to create their own products
Document all procedures in workbook
Develop and code flexible workflow
Incorporate code in intactness shiny app as a tab to allow users to create their own products
Document procedures in workbook
